    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_107388</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107388</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection and refraction in a glass block</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion und Brechung in einem Glasblock</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion et réfraction dans un bloc de verre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão e refraction em um bloco de vidro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione e rifrazione in un blocco di vetro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση και διάθλαση σε μια ομάδα δεδομένων 
γυαλιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión y refracción en un bloque de cristal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the path of the refracted rays (centre left and extreme left) and reflected rays (centre right and extreme right) from a glass-air interface.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bending of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glass block</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interface</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen den Pfad der refracted 
Strahlen (linkes und extremes links der Mitte) und reflektierten 
Strahlen (Mitte rechtes und extremes Recht) von einer Glas-Luft 
Schnittstelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent la voie d'accès des 
rayons réfractés (gauche gauche et extrême de centre) et ont
reflété des rayons (bonne et extrême droite de centre) d'une 
interface de verre-air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram o trajeto dos raios 
refracted (esquerda esquerda e extrema do centro) e refletiram raios 
(direita direita e extrema do centro) de uma relação do vidro-ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano il percorso dei 
raggi refracted (parte di sinistra di sinistra ed estrema del centro) 
ed hanno riflesso i raggi (giusta e destra estrema del centro) da 
un'interfaccia dell'vetro-aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν το μονοπάτι των 
διαθλασμένων ακτίνων (κεντρικό αριστερό και ακραίο αριστερό) και
των απεικονισμένων ακτίνων (κεντρικό σωστό και ακραίο δικαίωμα) 
από μια διαπροσωπεία γυαλί-αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran el camino de los 
rayos refractados (izquierda izquierda y extrema del centro) y 
reflejaron los rayos (la derecha derecha y extrema del centro) de un 
interfaz del cristal-aire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfallswinkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbiegen des Lichtes</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
